channel.title: gcc on Sinu John
channel.description: Recent content in gcc on Sinu John

item.title: A quick introduction toÂ GCC
item.description: GCC- GNU Compiler CollectionFrom GCC manual - When you invoke GCC, it normally does preprocessing, compilation, assembly and linking.This creates an executable ‘hello.out’ from file ‘hello.c’ -o specifies the output file. gcc -o hello.out hello.cpp This results in an error as gcc tries to perform C++ compilation(assumed from the extension .cpp). We can specify that the file is a C file as follows: gcc -x c -o hello.out hello.cpp -x specifies the language.
